document.full_text: the u.s. mortality rate fell to an all-time low in 2009, marking the 10th consecutive year of declines as death rates from heart disease and crime dropped, the federal government said on wednesday.
document.title: u.s. mortality rate falls to all-time low
lines_and_colors: the u.s. mortality rate fell to an all-time low in 2009, marking the 10th consecutive year of declines as death rates from heart disease and crime dropped, the federal government said on wednesday.
